replies.body: Oh boy...First the Lux ult buff...now her ultimate skin on sale!? ARAM going to be lux 24/7 now.
But... ARAM is random... so you don't get to choose...
It's only random in theory, there are a lot of ARAM only accounts that stack the deck in their favor.
But is there really someone willing to pay that much RP for a skin on an ARAM account?
bro you have no idea, people will waste money on anything.

If you must ask that, you must also ask if there is anyone willing to pay that much for a cosmetic that gives no advantage. 
The answer in both situations is yes.
Hell some people have all the ultimate skins on multiple accounts.

Watch as all the people who bought Elementalist Lux cry about the fact that people are getting them for like $5 less than before.

Because you know Riot, it'd be nice if you stopped raping my wallet for a good half second.
We have no reason to cry We get the border and i bought it for that much when it came out :)
I mean they outlined the policy for these "Early" skin sales a while ago. People should be used to it by now
Ultimate skins on sale?
They used to go on sale upon release, now they go on sale six months after release.
has it really been 6 months?
2450 for Elementalist Lux?  I may actually get it at that point.  Surprised it has a sale at all

Ultimate skins are eligible for early sales. Unless Riot changes something, this will be the only time it ever goes on sale, so if you want it I'd get it when it's on sale. I have it and it's a great skin.

They go on sale 5-6 months after release. It most likely will affect the Master Edition as well, but you still will not get the Origin Border and Icon so that makes forerunners still feel nice about themselves.
I've been waiting for this as well haha
Does early sale mean right on May 1st they will be for sale? Or is this a day just before May 1st?

Early sales are at the end of the month (around the 20th). Usually skins first go on sale about a year after being released, so the early sale is a chance to get them at 6 months for a price tier drop (i.e. 1350 -> 950) instead of a full half off. Early sales also are the only time to get Legendary and Ultimate skins on sale.
So around April 20th this skin would of been on sale? Fugg! I forgot to check post to see this! Argh! {{item:3070}}

lol no, around May 20 or so( usually the last weekend of the month) the skin will go on sale; the "early" in "early sale" has nothing to do with what time of the month the sale takes place, it has to with the skin coming on sale early compared to the 12 month minimum a skin usually has to wait to hit the monthly 50% sale roster (except spirit fire Brand because Riot likes the dick. lol). 
This will be the ONLY time Elementalist Lux will come on sale as Legendary and Ultimate Skins ONLY GET THE ONE SALE 6 months after release, you still have plenty of time to prepare so it won't be a surprise and you can be sure to get her dope ass skin for a good price.
TUNDRA WARWICK YEESSSS
I paid full price for Elementalist Lux, I would have NEVER bought it at full price if I had known it would go on sale, what is this, Rito?

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts

TLDR Ultimate and Legendary skins go on sale once, approximate 6 months after release
The Lux ultimate is going on sale? What about Star Guardian Jinx and Frejlord Taliyah, which have been out for like 6 months and 10 months, longer than a skin is supposed to take to go on sale.
Star Guardian Jinx is going on early sale this month. Just wait literally a few more days.

> [{quoted}](name=Morning Raven,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=ycQxwqnZ,comment-id=00160001,timestamp=2017-04-20T14:50:26.225+0000)
>
> Star Guardian Jinx is going on early sale this month. Just wait literally a few more days.

Somehow I missed that, even though I'm constanly checking for the sales of the 2 skins, I've seen nothing that keeps track of when a skin was on sale saying that Frejlord Taliyah had gone on sale yet though.

You just need to check the posts of sales each month


Although I use this: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1T5h1LKTRCVg3NU9XA3NSlrGS1dF5YO6KfEePIL893SU/edit#gid=0
as a guide. It updates when stuff goes on sale. (It needs a number update for how many days til stuff is due though since there are a lot more skins to cycle through now)

Freljord Taliyah could be a bit, it's been 360 days since it's release while it's been 569 and 613 days for Spirit Fire Brand and Project Leona respectively; some skins, especially for underplayed champs, just get over looked or are used in bundles almost exclusively for a long time after release, since it's a good incentive for getting players to buy bundles; if there's a skin you really want that has yet to come on sale for one of your mains then you may be willing to buy a bundle with a couple of cheaper skins for champs you may not play as much just to get that one skin cheaper.
I'm pretty sure freljord Taliyah was on sale few months back, since I remember myself being salty for buying it before the sale

Anyone know when will Project Katarina be on sales?I think her last sales was on January.I want it to be my first time ever using real money to buy an in-game stuff.Im a free to play player but i just want that skin.

She was released in last summer. So if you wait for sometime between July and September she probably will go on sale then. (Month range because they tend to split up skins released at the same time so I'm fitting in Project Ekko but no Kat or vice versa)
Sorry for the very long late reply.Didnt know how to see my updates since i was new.thank u for the time and detailed information.
So Cosmic Reaver Kassadin is still not going on sale. Maybe next year?

think it was on sale around a year ago so it shouldnt be too awfully long but it still has to cycle back through. honestly its the best skin in the game for its value so paying full price is definitely worth it.
Ahem, WAS the best skin in the game. I'm more exited about Cosmic Blade Yi. And I don't even play Yi!
I, personally, think the Kass one looks better. Personal preference though.
it's been 576 days since its last sale (which was release) just like Spirit Fire Brand who's sale I having been impatiently awaiting for almost 2 years now. lol
I unluckily got spirit fire brand in a mystery chest about a week after I bought zombie brand so i haven't used it once. haha

Lolz I have zombie and cryocore but spiritfire is way better in my opinion.
Only the Lux Star Guardian skin for me this go round.
Man 2 {{champion:99}} skins this month..really
what other skin?
Star guardian{{champion:99}}
Lux skins tho

I wanna know why Star Guardian Jinx never went on sale in April (like the sale schedule said) and why after like a week the schedule was taken off the client and replaced with a March schedule- when clearly it was APRIL D: RITO YOU FAIL

April isn't over... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 




###### I'm dying to get her too but she'll probably the last April sale.
been waiting a while for the academy skins to go on sale......
